ocrd-tesserocr-deskew.description: Detect script, orientation and skew angle for pages or regions

operation_level.description: PAGE XML hierarchy level to operate on

min_orientation_confidence.description: Minimum confidence score to apply orientation as detected by OSD

ocrd-tesserocr-recognize.description: Recognize text in lines with tesseract

textequiv_level.description: PAGE XML hierarchy level to add the TextEquiv results to (requires existing layout annotation up to one level above that)

overwrite_words.description: remove existing layout and text annotation below the TextLine level (regardless of textequiv_level)

model.description: tessdata model to apply (an ISO 639-3 language specification or some other basename, e.g. deu-frak or Fraktur)

ocrd-tesserocr-segment-region.description: Segment regions into lines with tesseract

overwrite_regions.description: remove existing layout and text annotation below the Page level

padding.description: extend detected region rectangles by this many (true) pixels

crop_polygons.description: annotate polygon coordinates instead of bounding box rectangles

ocrd-tesserocr-segment-line.description: Segment page into regions with tesseract

overwrite_lines.description: remove existing layout and text annotation below the TextRegion level

ocrd-tesserocr-segment-word.description: Segment lines into words with tesseract

overwrite_words.description: remove existing layout and text annotation below the TextLine level

ocrd-tesserocr-crop.description: Poor man's cropping via region segmentation

padding.description: extend detected border by this many (true) pixels on every side

ocrd-tesserocr-binarize.description: Binarize regions or lines with Tesseract's global Otsu

operation_level.description: PAGE XML hierarchy level to operate on
